entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.0°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
